name: crayons
description: Crayons Packages comprising of Design system library using web components, icon library and i18n library

scripts.build: lerna run build --stream && npm run storybook:build && npm run docs:build
scripts.docs:dev: lerna run build --stream && node www/scripts/reorganize.js && vuepress dev www
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:styles
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:ts:fix && npm run lint:styles
scripts.release-next: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna publish from-package --no-commit-hooks --dist-tag next
scripts.release-next:ci: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna publish from-package --no-commit-hooks --dist-tag next --yes
scripts.release-latest: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna publish from-package --no-commit-hooks --dist-tag latest
scripts.release-latest:ci: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna publish from-package --no-commit-hooks --dist-tag latest --yes
scripts.update-next: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --preid beta --no-push && npm run clean-changelog && npm run update-lock:next
scripts.update-next:ci: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-prerelease --preid beta --no-push --yes && npm run clean-changelog && npm run update-lock:next
scripts.update-latest: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate && npm run clean-changelog && npm run update-lock:latest
scripts.update-latest:ci: HUSKY_INSTALL=1 HUSKY_SKIP_HOOKS=1 lerna version --conventional-commits --conventional-graduate && npm run clean-changelog && npm run update-lock:latest

author: Freshworks Inc
